pages.text: 36|55|sillo geunal cheongug-e geojuhaneun jadeul-eun geudeul-i haenghan modeun geos-eulo keuge gippeohalila
36|56|geudeul-eun geuui anaedeulgwa siwon han geuneul-eseo jangsigdoen chimsang-e gidae eo
36|57|modeun gwail-eul jeulgimyeo geudeul-i wonhaneun modeun geos-eul gajge doemyeo
36|60|adam-ui jasondeul-iyeo naega neohuiege illeo satan-eul sungbaehaji malla geuneun neohuideul-ui bunmyeonghan jeog-ila
36|61|geuleomeulo naman-eul gyeongbaehala geugeos-i olh-eun gil-ila haji anihaessdeonyo
36|62|geuleona satan-eun neohui gaundemanh-eun mulileul banghwangtolog haessnani neohuineun ihaehaji moshaessneunyo
36|64|hwayeom-eul masbola igeos-eun neohuiga gojibhayeo jinlileul geoyeoghan ttaemun-ila
36|65|geunal hananib-eun geudeul-ui ib-eul bonghani geudeul-ui sondeul-i hananim-egeiyagi hago geudeul-ui baldeul-eun geudeul i haenghan modeun geos-eul jeung-eonhapeola
36|66|hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon hananim-eun geudeul-ui silyeog-eul as-a gass-eu lila geuttae geudeul-eun gil-eul deodeum-eo chaj-euna geudeul-eun eotteohge bol su issneunyo
36|67|hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon geu deul-ui jangso-e gojeongsikyeoss-eul geos-imyeo geuttae geudeul-eun umjig-il sudo eobs-eoss-eul geos-imyeo dasi dol-aol sudo eobs-eul geos ila
36|68|hananim-i jangsuhage hasa ha nanim-i geulo hayeo dasi doedol-a ga ge hanani geulaedo geudeul-eun ihaeha ji moshaneunyo
36|69|hananim-eun yeeonja-ege sileul galeuchiji anihaess-eumyeo siin-eun geu ege jeoghabhaji anhnola igeos-eun me sejilo sasil-eul balghyeojuneun kkulan-ila
36|70|igeos-eulo sal-aissneun ideul-e ge gyeong-gohago bulsinjadeul-egeneun jin liui malsseum-i silhyeondoege hayeossnola
